document_data.mainbody:
ulsantirs Gate was the main gate in the city of Westgate.
Mulsantirs Gate was located on the western side of Westgate. The Traders Road passed through the gate into the city where its name was changed to the Kings March.
The gate was named in honor of Mulsantir Illistine I, a mercenary from Chondath who overthrew the last pirate king of Westgate and claimed the throne for himself in the .
